meta.title: COVID-19 Resources

meta.name: DESCRIPTION
meta.content: Helpful resources for L.A. County districts and schools in preparing for and handling COVID-19

input.name: __EVENTVALIDATION

span.span: Home > Health and Safety > Coronavirus Resources

Los Angeles County declared a local health emergency in response to the novel coronavirus (COVID-19) on March 4, 2020. The situation is an emerging and evolving issue in LA County, California and the rest of the nation.
This web page is intended to provide helpful resources to districts and schools in preparing for and handling COVID-19.

p.span: Susan Chaides speaks about the coronavirus (COVID-19)
